name: at least i look cool
content: I drive a car that doesn't work
我开着一辆坏掉的汽车
I shop at Target for my shirts
我在廉价商店买衣服
And when I pay my rent it hurts
每次付房租 我都很心痛
But I got invited to this thing so
但我收到了一份邀请
I think tonight I'm going out
我觉得今晚我要出去玩
I'm getting off my s**tty couch
我要远离那破烂沙发
Ready to f**k my bank account
准备挥霍一番
And I'm not myself
我已不是我自己
But at least I look cool
但至少 我看起来很酷
At some house in Malibu
在马里布海滩边的某个房子里
Taking pictures by the pool
在泳池边拍照
Doing things I'd never do
做着我从未做过的事
But at least I look cool
但至少 我看起来很酷
Oh God I think I might throw up
天哪 我觉得我要吐了
不知道我到底喝了什么
And I'll admit this kinda sucks
我承认 这感觉很难受
But before I leave I know I gotta
但在我离开之前 我知道 我必须
Find somewhere d**e that I can pose
找个好地方 摆个好姿势拍照
Adjust my hair adjust my clothes
整理一下头发 整理一下衣服
So I can get that fire post
这样就能收到超多赞
And it's all for show
都是为了演给别人看
But at least I look cool
但至少 我看起来很酷
At some house in Malibu
在马里布海滩边的某个房子里
Taking pictures by the pool
在泳池边拍照
Doing things I'd never do
做着我从未做过的事
But at least I look cool
但至少 我看起来很酷
At some house I can't afford
在一个我住不起的房子里
Blacked out on the tennis court
昏倒在网球场
Honestly I'm kinda bored
坦白说 我觉得有点无聊
But at least I look cool
但至少 我看起来很酷
I just lied about my age
我跟别人谎报了年纪
Nobody even knows my name
没人知道我的名字
Got an UberPOOL on the way
出行只能坐最便宜的优步车
Shh
But at least I look cool
但至少 我看起来很酷

在泳池边拍照

But at least I look cool
